title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server to pull, run and manage large language models locally (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration that wraps Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) to chat with local models, upload docs, RAG, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama exposing sync/async APIs, streaming, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing models via Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: A Go CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API for quick pulls, lists, and interactive chat from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama with chat history and model switching.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team to use local models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models and switch models on the fly.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app to mention @Ollama and get private or channel responses from any local model.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to integrate Ollama models into no-code automation workflows (chat, completion, embed).

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger CI module to spin up Ollama as a service in your pipelines for testing or doc-generation tasks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Reference repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, vision models, fine-tune adapters, and more.
